thread.title: Ground News - Zelensky praises Pope: Thanks to Ukrainians, Russian murderers do not march through Europe
thread.title_full: Ground News - Zelensky praises Pope: Thanks to Ukrainians, Russian murderers do not march through Europe

author: Novinky.cz
title: Ground News - Zelensky praises Pope: Thanks to Ukrainians, Russian murderers do not march through Europe
text: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky has said that Ukrainians are the reason why murderers are not marching through Europe. Zelensky said this in a video message in which he thanked Ukrainian troops and indirectly chastised the pope for his call for Ukraine to fly the white flag. This is reported by the newspaper Ukrainska Pravda.
